column1: Thank you so much for your continuous support @ACC_National   Only 4 days left until Election Day— let’s cross the finish line strong! https://t.co/itCGyeeCod
Thank you @ACUConservative for the endorsement!    I look forward to returning to Washington D.C. to represent the 4th district of Arkansas! https://t.co/88xtJ4gqis

Thank you @ArkansasPBS for hosting a socially distant & safe debate today!   Visit https://t.co/IXbwHhnRDt to view today’s debate and hear why I deserve your vote for re-election to the United States Congress.  #GOP #VOTE #AR4 🇺🇸 https://t.co/P3rDABH7jh
Thank you to the Arkansas Democrat Gazette for endorsing me for re-election and highlighting my focus on forest management for healthy profitable forests! 🌲🌲🌲 https://t.co/1SACXLsk7P
“People on opposing teams didn’t like it when I ran right over them either. But that’s how you get the job done.” Great job @HerschelWalker @GOPconvention https://t.co/EcjDpwivtx

What a misleading & poorly written opinion! The only partisan congressional or leg. districts ever drawn in AR were drawn by Dems. Republicans have never drawn the lines yet have super majorities in the legislature & hold all federal offices. #sorelosers  https://t.co/kHutghxpqL

Still lots of empty gates at #ATL but most activity in the airports I’ve seen during the pandemic. Essential airline workers are still on the job. Congress should be too. @SpeakerPelosi https://t.co/HIvpmcl4no

Today House Dems tossed the Constitution and cast proxy votes for the first time in the 231-year history of the House.  We must uphold the Constitution. That’s why I joined the lawsuit against Pelosi. https://t.co/6fDJFpE3kO

In 2016 Democrats broke House rules by staging a sit-in and streaming video from the House floor. It was appalling to me but didn’t seem to bother them to toss out over 200 years of decorum  during their temper tantrum. https://t.co/Eqe3kKfHZp
